data.title: New evidence reveals FBI demands companies secretly turn over crypto keys, allowing them to simultaneously wiretap all customers worldwide, and threatens to jail them if they violate the gag order

99% of Kidnappings in Mexico Went Unreported Last Yr - Thanks to fallout from continued crackdown on illegal drugs, its crime rate—number of crimes per 100 heads—is over 34, a near historic high. No wonder Mexicans are more concerned with security than unemployment, inflation, or health.
